overview: In this war drama, a brave reporter tries to remain detached while covering the war in Shanghai. While there, he falls for an ex-streetwalker, but must compete with a mercenary pilot for her love. By the end, the correspondent loses his objectivity after he helps the pilot save the woman from the enemy. The rescue costs the pilot his life.
tagline: ROMANTIC DRAMA OF A WOMAN --- AND TWO MEN WHO MADE A RACKET OF THE CHINESE WAR AND LOVE!
title: War Correspondent
